website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this full-coverage formula is worth considering if you are looking for a lasting, protective concealer to wear under your eyes.
pros: Nutrient-rich formula that produces full coverage and skin enhancing benefits to the delicate area under the eyes
Waterproof, and wears all day for most customers
cons: Some users found the consistency to be heavy and pasty, and slightly difficult to blend
Some shades are lighter than expected

customer_reviews.title: Not the same consistency
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 2 years now and i love it as it covers perfectly. This is the First time I ordered it from Amazon and it is a tottally different product. Not sure if one has anyyghing to do with the other but its super watery and it takes tons of effort to cover when the other 2 tubs I've used took almost no effort at all n very little product. I'm hoping by ordering directly from IT Cosmetics ill get the original product I fell in love with.... TO BE CONTINUE.
customer_reviews.author: corinne

customer_reviews.title: New formula; not as good as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite concealer due to the fact that it was extremely opaque and not greasy like other concealers. However, when I received if this time the tube was different. It has a clear plastic tip instead of the old black tip it used to have and the concealer inside is not the same. The new formula is greasy and not as opaque as it used to be. I am so disappointed! This might be good for contouring but for someone who has dark circles this concealer is no longer adequate for concealing. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Well I finally broke open this new tube of Light (ultra fair) after just finishing my previous QVC sample tube of concealer from It. While I love the coverage, it is a bit too light for me and the instructions were not similar to using my previous sample from QVC. My QVC sample tube was a lot smaller and creamier after warming a bit of it up on the back of my hand before dabbing it under my eyes. The colors were off as well. I was also very disturbed that the new tube I received here was less than a third full. Disappointing to say the least, hence my two star rating. I felt cheated out of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Isenhower

customer_reviews.title: It is more watery compared to the last tube I ...
customer_reviews.text: It is more watery compared to the last tube I bought from Ulta. Also, the nozzle where the product comes out is a clear plastic, my previous one was black. I haven’t figured out yet if that’s a change in design or a sign it’s counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Not the original product
customer_reviews.text: So, I love this product and have ordered it before on Amazon with no issues. After seeing all the reviews saying they were selling a rip off product I was hesitant to order again, but figured I would take my changes. Well, it is a rip off product and I took pictures as proof. I will be sending it back and going to Sephora or Alta or wherever I can be sure I am getting the real deals. In the above photos you can see the top and dispenser are different and the coverage on the left in the arm pic, the color is definitely warmer and the coverage not as full. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Grina

customer_reviews.title: The first order had the version I love..
customer_reviews.text: Was the product changed by it, or is Amazon selling a different version? This is my second order off Amazon. The first order had the version I love... Nice and thick. Covers well and stays put all day. This latest iteration was thin, with a different top, does little coverage, and does not last. I can spend $7 at the drugstore for that lack of quality. Really bummed. I hope the formula has not changed! If so, time to find a new concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Moore

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I’ve been purchasing this product at Ulta and the company changed the formula and I wasn’t able to get the “old one” there anymore. I was happy to find it on amazon and didn’t pay any more than at the store. This concealer is perfect for covering less than perfect complexions and stays put all day without getting oily or cracking.
customer_reviews.author: RJsMama

customer_reviews.title: Product seems thinned or watered down
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. This product is totally watered down. I didn’t use it right away, so now I can’t return it, but I would NOT order this. The other bye bye under I have from another source is way thicker and covers way better. I wish I could return it and get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-day wear
customer_reviews.text: This definitely stays in place all day. I heard about this from a makeup artist on YouTube and figured I'd try it. I've never had such a good experience with under-eye concealer. Takes a minute to apply because it is pretty thick but then I I dust some powder on top and it stays all day. Not super heavy feeling and not uncomfortable. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: LAD01

customer_reviews.title: Tried for IPSY
customer_reviews.text: I received this product as a sample through IPSY and enjoyed it so I bought the full size here on amazon. After using for awhile I found this formula to be sticky/tacky. Easily smudges and gathers through out the day. the pigment is great I just wont wear this when Tm expecting a long day. MC
customer_reviews.author: axrue

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase from this seller
customer_reviews.text: I love Bye Bye Under Eye. Have used it for a year. Tiny tube lasted me the entire time. I purchased another tube through this seller that is 1/4 full and came in Ultra Light that I did not order. It's crap.
customer_reviews.author: RBo

customer_reviews.title: Not Really A Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Does not really conceal or cover a blemish on face. It''s weak. Does not know if the product is really like that originally or I've gotten a counterfeit since I've got it through Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Goodness

customer_reviews.title: Covers under eye and cystic acne, but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely covers under eye. Be careful how much product applied or end up with raccoon white eyes. Requires very little amount applied by ring fingers for best results. Amazing blemish cover up as I have adult cystic acne. Rated 4/5 due to price.
customer_reviews.author: Whovian

customer_reviews.title: Sire to give a bad review on this
customer_reviews.text: This was a total RIP off! Received this today and when I went to use it, it had a huge air bubble in it and there is less then 20% of product in the tube! Thanks 'IT". Sire to give a bad review on this!
customer_reviews.author: DianeNailTech

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! You are going to love it. Less is definitely more. Just a small dab under your eyes or wherever you need it; blend it in and have a gorgeous finish. You won't believe that I purchased this over 8 months ago; and I am using it regularly. This little tube goes a very long way!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra2010

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It’s the best under eye concealer I’ve found. I have pink toned fair skin, this covers the dark circles like magic and keeps the crows feet under control too!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: posted bad review by mistake. This product is great. Just as described. Meant to be reviewing another product
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Concealer fills up only half the tube. To get it to come out you have to fold the bottom up twice. Not worth the money. Kinda like a bag of chips are half full when you open them. Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, stays put for a long time. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this concealer before. It has great coverage. I sometimes use it as a foundation as well. The light is a very pale color which is what I need. I am very fair skinned. I love this product. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Originally got this in my ipsy glambag, fell in love and decided for convenience to order from Amazon. I should have read the reviews, this is NOT THE REAL product! Wrong shade and watery! Put many coats on and still had no coverage, if you've ever had the real product you know it's very thick and only takes a small amount. I was able to return for a full refund though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winner!!
customer_reviews.text: First product that actually covered my heriditory darkness under my eyes!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn's Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This works! I use my tiny beauty blender, moistened first, to apply the product. I begin by dotting the skin under the eye and blending outward toward the nose and a bit down below the lower lid. It works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: BeeMama

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this concealer to cover a bruise that I got under my eye after a fall. It is great coverage and a very small amount goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Price

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for better coverage.
customer_reviews.text: This only take a little bit to cover, but I find I still see my circles through it. If i put it on too thick, then it looks cakey. I was hoping for better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Blends beautifully for an almost perfect coverage of dark under Eye circles. I could still see some shadows after use, but the texture is creamy and blended easily with a makeup sponge. It's been the best product I've tried so far for my bluish discoloration. I use the lightest shade due to porcelain coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! It is not the same product! I have order this multiple times and have gotten the same product as is sold by it cosmetics. This last time, the product is completely different, it is watered down, covers nothing, and has a weird smell. Plus, it’s $2 cheaper to buy from the real manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: Seth Bamberry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, it does the job well and omg, one teeny tiny dot is a ton of product. seriously a little goes a loooooong way.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is very thick. A little goes a long way and I found it difficult to blend
customer_reviews.author: leland harger

customer_reviews.title: Concealed great. Tube material is inferior.
customer_reviews.text: This concealer rocks! I'm 50 and wear the IT powder foundation. BUT I have had to return two tubes, because they split open at the cap. Then I have to squirt the stuff into a different container.
customer_reviews.author: M. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Too light of product
customer_reviews.text: I bought IT cosmetics Bye bye under eye concealer. I used for dark spots on and under the eye. This color was too too light I should have returned the product but I was trying to mix it with the IT foundation to get it little darker. This did not work because the eye concealer is so thick it would not mix up. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Francis

customer_reviews.title: It is my favorite concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this product still is not 100%, but it has been the best concealer for under my eyes that I have tried so far. I feel like it conceals and hydrates. It creases at times, but not it is not bad at all. When you apply the right amount it lasts for hours and wont crease. A small amount goes a long way and works better.
customer_reviews.author: Gio Das

customer_reviews.title: It’s pale enough for me!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WORKS DUDE FOR ALL U PALE PASTY GEISHA GIRLS U WANT THIS ONE
customer_reviews.author: Nihli

customer_reviews.title: Great under eye concealer!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer a medium to thick texture and has full coverage. I've been using this for over a year now and I'm obsessed! I've never had a concealer with such great coverage before. It's also nice that it doesn't cake up in my fine lines
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rossi

customer_reviews.title: SUPER WATERPROOF. APPLY AND FORGET ABOUT IT
customer_reviews.text: SUPER WATERPROOF. APPLY AND FORGET ABOUT IT! So nice for humid florida summers. I even snorkel with this stuff on and it doesnt even budge.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor B

customer_reviews.title: Product was not as expected from write-ups. Found it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as expected from write-ups. Found it to be extremely dry. Color was okay. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great under eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great under eye concealer. It is full coverage. It makes a complete difference in dark circles and puffiness.
customer_reviews.author: Larra

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD, FORMULA HAS CHANGED
customer_reviews.text: NOT good. The formula of this has been changed. I’ve purchased it for years and this tube I purchased is suddenly MUCH thinner and more watery and provides about 5% of the coverage that it used to have. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover up. A little goes a LONG way. Literally barely a dab on your finger covers both eyes. Suggest using a brush for application as this is thick.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clingan

customer_reviews.title: Best- hands down
customer_reviews.text: Best under eye cover up I've ever used and I've tried a bunch! I am fair but decided to order one shade darker as the product is a bit light. I may need to mix the two- not sure yet. You only need a dab- trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done. A little thick but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. A little thick but I just mix it with a touch of lighter/creamier concealer to lessen the thickness.
customer_reviews.author: JJC

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as it truly covers fine lines and blemishes. You really do have to give it a minute to warm up before you appIy it. I would definitely purchased it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concealer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concealer. You don’t need a lot. A small tune like this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the actual product!!! It did not cover anything. If anything it made me look worse than if I had no makeup on at all. I had to literally use makeup wipes to remove before i could go anywhere. I'm 31 yrs old , it didn't need to even cover that much! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not the real Bye Bye Undereye.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real stuff. Do not buy....I opened it and it is all watery and doesn't cover at all. Go to Ulta and buy from them. I want my money back but they wont return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the real product
customer_reviews.text: This product isn't the real iT bye bye under eye! I had a little left in my other tube, and compared them. This particular product is by far my greasy and does not cover like the real one. Also, the tip was a clear dispenser while the other was a solid black.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: So thick I can barely squeeze it out of tube
customer_reviews.author: Tanya R

customer_reviews.title: Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this is the real product. I have used this before and the consistency was different, the coverage was bad, I won’t use the tube I got from this seller again. The product didn’t even fully fit in the box it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Nichole Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Best Concealer I've Found
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It does a fantastic job. Just a little dab on a sponge goes a long way and you're good to go all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was unhappy with this product due to the fact that the tube seemed to be almost completely empty upon arrival. To even get any out I was having to sqeeeze and push up from bottom to get the concealer out and only then could I get a very small amount. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this exact kind of makeup for years and the one I just got delivered is NOT what it’s supposed to be! It is watered down and is NOT “bye bye under eye” that it claims to be!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product before and liked it HOWEVER when I opened this most recent purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before and liked it HOWEVER when I opened this most recent purchase the tube is 95% empty and the product ones not seem the same. I would not buy cosmetic from this seller again and even if that seller is Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: great product--only need a "mustard-seed" sized amount for full coverage ...
customer_reviews.text: great product--only need a "mustard-seed" sized amount for full coverage under eyes; a small tube could probably last a year. just wish the medium tone was available when i purchased because the "fair" is too light for me...but it covers the dark circles so i don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA FIGUEROA-LUGARO

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!!
customer_reviews.text: A bit thick so I layer it with my eye crème and it looks and feels quite superior to other eye products.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Lunney

customer_reviews.title: Is this a knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: This is not like the product I bought at the store.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Did not get the color I ordered but I didn’t notice until after I had opened it. The liquid is very thin , no coverage as it claims.
customer_reviews.author: sandra montes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer. Just makes it a little with your moisturizer and it'll last forever. Great coverage
customer_reviews.author: Millie1254

customer_reviews.title: Not full tube of product☹️
customer_reviews.text: The product worked good but there was very little product in the tube. Not worth paying that much money for a product that does not give you a full tube of the product you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, hard to blend but I just use moisturizer under it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Makeup concealer tube sent half empty!
customer_reviews.text: Half the tube was filled with air, missing half the makeup contents!! Will never buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kate O.

customer_reviews.title: This product is not something that blends easily. When apying it under the eye it does ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not something that blends easily. When apying it under the eye it does not blend easily thus you end up causing the skin to stretch exasperating the very problem you are trying to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Small amount, complete coverage
customer_reviews.text: Total block-out coverage with the tiniest dab! Nice brightening effect for my eye area as well. Tends to gather in the small creases under my lower lid and requires additional blending with a q-tip, but worth the extra touch-up for the concealing power :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The tube was not full and what was in it seemed old.

customer_reviews.title: Find it an excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. Find it an excellent product!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, the tube was almost empty ! I've been buying this product for years and have never seen this before.
customer_reviews.author: Karolyn Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Use only if your under 40
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected,to be a award winning under eye concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Shiver

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic! You only need an itty bitty tiny amount, so it's going to last a while, which helps me justify the price. It goes on smoothly, is easy to blend, and covers dark circles like a dream. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Darkprism

customer_reviews.title: Best product so far
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best under eye concealer I have ever used. Beats all the $$$ ones. Know wonder the stars use it.

customer_reviews.title: Covers!
customer_reviews.text: Covers everything, use a sponge to start and finish with a brush to blend.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us older gals
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage, but WAY too thick. Not for mature skin.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Too thick
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is way too thick and applies very cakey.

customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite. Covers dark circles and makes your face look fresh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing coverage, applies silky and seamlessly. Excellent product, highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer so much it's perfection! But when I received it the tube was more than half empty :( almost entirely air. Very disappointing

customer_reviews.title: My wife had heard great things about the coverage for dark circles but she ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife had heard great things about the coverage for dark circles but she said it applies very thickly and doesn't cover as well as the hype. Still decent as a regular cover up if you can apply it thin and don't have very dark circles under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Crandell

customer_reviews.title: by by cover up, under eye.
customer_reviews.text: I Love, Love , Love this product, would not go without it if I could help it, it is sooo worth it, makes you look younger, I get compliments on my face all the time., cover beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: Great product by the color was too light
customer_reviews.text: Too light, I have fair skin. But this was too light for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great pigment with only a dot size of concealer. Use it as primer on lids. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best eye under cover, use proper applications, you need very little and use a soft brush

customer_reviews.text: The package is empty. Want a full refund and new tube. Have purchased before and it’s full however this tube is empty.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really covers blemishes & a little goes a long way!

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a different product now :-(
customer_reviews.text: This has been my all time favorite concealer for 3 years now. I have ordered this from amazon before as well as purchased at Ulta. This last order, the formula is completely different. I compared it to my tube I already had. The consistency is creamier, the coverage is lighter, the color is slightly darker. I’m so disappointed as I LOVED the original product. I don’t know if my tube is a default or if they’ve changed the ingredients. I want my old formula back.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great under eye coverage
customer_reviews.text: Best makeup out there that I've tried . Came promptly .

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer on the market. I have very dark under sun damage and have tried everything and this reallllllly works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The coverage is nice
customer_reviews.text: It is marketed to not crease or fall into the lines and wrinkles....it does. The coverage is nice though
customer_reviews.author: April Flesher

customer_reviews.title: run of the mill concealer
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing special about this concealer at all. i was looking for something that would not crease in my little lines, as that is what this product claims. i may as well been using the concealer i was looking to replace. this stuff creased after no time at all. i tried using a little, then i tried using more...same result no matter. i don't like how it kind of "dries" as you let it sit on your skin, as well. as a makeup artist i guess i should know better than divert from cream based concealers. guess i was just looking for that "bulletproof" product, but no luck here.
customer_reviews.author: big calves

customer_reviews.title: like expected
customer_reviews.text: I have read a lot of good things about this one, and I totally agree. It is really good, probably the best I have tryed so far.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! The best concealer I have ever used!

customer_reviews.title: disappointed

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how much I love IT cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love IT cosmetics. The under eye is great, but I don't need that cause I have bags, not dark circles. I'm in the middle of getting rid of all my cosmetics and replacing them with IT. My skin is very sensitive and I break out very easily, and I have not had that problem with IT. Thank You so much, I'm a very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann Felix

customer_reviews.title: Where..is it?
customer_reviews.text: I received the package -- and it feels like 90% of the product is used. I swear, the first time I pressed down on the tube it was difficult (almost impossible) to get out. This isn't a sample size, what gives? I can't really give a good review on the actual product because I have an icky feeling that this may have been probed in a Target beauty aisle or something,
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

product_meta.title: It Cosmetics Bye Bye Under Eye Full Coverage Waterproof Concealer - Light, 0.28 oz
product_meta.description: Size:0.28 OunceFull Size: 0.28 ounce/8 gram Sealed
feature_bullets: It's Your Life-Changing Concealer! Full Coverage Anti-Aging Waterproof Concealer

Developed with plastic surgeons, this #1 best-selling, award-winning waterproof concealer delivers highly pigmented, long-lasting coverage that won’t crease or crack, plus anti-aging peptides, vitamins, hydrolyzed collagen, hyaluronic acid and antioxidants, this revolutionary concealer improves the appearance of wrinkles and effectively conceals the look of skin imperfections including dark cir
Beauty Tips: Using your It Cosmetics Dual Airbrush Concealer Brush #2, blend Bye Bye Under Eye around your eyes, nose and lips to instantly erase the look of imperfections.
Original Light Shade, Size: 0.28 FL OZ UNBOXED
